channel.title: Platform Engine - Open Source
channel.description:
Hey everybody I found an old game I was creating a while ago and decided to release it as an engine. It is really good and very noob friendly. Its mostly D&D but has great physics and gameplay.
Download .exe - http://up.ht/k5Faal Download .gmk Source - http://up.ht/kp3w26
Controls - Use the arrow keys to move press up to jump - up twice to double jump.
Credits - Joe's Adventure A TSGC Production [b]Publishing By[/b] YoYo Games [b]For My Little Brother Joseph[/b] [b]Lead Programming[/b] Trenton Kidder [b]Aditional Programming[/b] Mark Overmars - Scrolling Text Example [b]Lead Graphics[/b] Included Files of GM [b]Additional Graphics[/b] Trenton Kidder [b]Origional Music Composed And Produced By[/b] Geoff Zanelli [b]Lead Sounds[/b] Included Files of GM [b]Additional Sound Support[/b] Online Resources [b]Special Thanks[/b] YoYo Games Game Maker 8.0 Pro GM Resources http://www.yoyogames.com HyperCam [b]BETA Testers[/b] Joseph Bistran Claudia 'Jean' Gash Mike Bistran Thomas Gash Heather Lewis Meygan Vimini Stevie Kidder Claud 'Papa' Gash
Images - [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot100-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot101-1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/screenshot102-1.png[/img]

item.title: Platform Engine - Open Source
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:7, topic:395765”]Looks decent :L

Off-topic (don’t really want to make an entire topic for this):

I want to make a game like Dead Ops Arcade on Black Ops. I love that game lol. Not a lot of people find it fun, but I do. When I can’t go on my own xbox (I have a brother who plays on that shit 24/7), I play on the computer. Usually get bored within 10 minutes. I want to create Dead Ops Arcade so I can play it on the computer and probably release it here. No idea where to start. I have a 2d base thing, it’s that triangle game that somebody made and posted on here. I could replace the character triangle with a guy with a gun or something, then the enemy triangles with zombies running at you and you have to shoot them but that wouldn’t make me understand the basics properly. I want to learn but don’t feel like reading those articles that are long as fuck. What should I do? …I’m not expecting a great response at all.[/quote]

Actually its funny that you said this! I just started making a DOA last night cuz my little brother does the same thing lol. Here it is open source. Its just started and all it has so far is player movement(WASD), shooting(Left Mouse Button), player faces the mouse pointer direction, a basic HUD(Shows score and health), zombie waves, and every 5 levels is a challenge wave. Here is the source: http://www.mediafire.com/?lpk6gcyn71xktua

Game Maker 8.0 Pro Download If Needed: http://www.mediafire.com/?62133k46nih676v

Read full topic

item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:7, topic:395765”]Looks decent :L

Off-topic (don’t really want to make an entire topic for this):

I want to make a game like Dead Ops Arcade on Black Ops. I love that game lol. Not a lot of people find it fun, but I do. When I can’t go on my own xbox (I have a brother who plays on that shit 24/7), I play on the computer. Usually get bored within 10 minutes. I want to create Dead Ops Arcade so I can play it on the computer and probably release it here. No idea where to start. I have a 2d base thing, it’s that triangle game that somebody made and posted on here. I could replace the character triangle with a guy with a gun or something, then the enemy triangles with zombies running at you and you have to shoot them but that wouldn’t make me understand the basics properly. I want to learn but don’t feel like reading those articles that are long as fuck. What should I do? …I’m not expecting a great response at all.[/quote]
Talking about my game? I could adapt something in for shooting actually. Just collision would need to be optimized.

item.title: Platform Engine - Open Source
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Looks decent :L

Off-topic (don’t really want to make an entire topic for this):

I want to make a game like Dead Ops Arcade on Black Ops. I love that game lol. Not a lot of people find it fun, but I do. When I can’t go on my own xbox (I have a brother who plays on that shit 24/7), I play on the computer. Usually get bored within 10 minutes. I want to create Dead Ops Arcade so I can play it on the computer and probably release it here. No idea where to start. I have a 2d base thing, it’s that triangle game that somebody made and posted on here. I could replace the character triangle with a guy with a gun or something, then the enemy triangles with zombies running at you and you have to shoot them but that wouldn’t make me understand the basics properly. I want to learn but don’t feel like reading those articles that are long as fuck. What should I do? …I’m not expecting a great response at all.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer

@GML_Programmer wrote:

It depends if you know anything about programming. If you know nothing and are just starting its difficult to understand at first, but with time it gets easier just like with any other programming language.
